turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you place a Starbucks order for me and I'll pick it up when it's ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location are you closest to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right now I am near the one on Kietzki and South Virginia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The one by the Wal Mart?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's the one!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Which drink you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A caramel macchiato

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do Venti

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just regular 2% milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you make it almond milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an extra shot of espresso, two extra pumps of caramel and a pump of chocolate

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hot, Iced, or Frappuccino?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, I didn't even think about that. I was going to get it hot. But, lets do a frapp.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, are you sure?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Absolutely

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I got a venti caramel macchiato frappuccino with almond milk, an extra shot, 2 extra caramel pumps and a pump of chocolate, is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's exactly right. No, that'll be all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome, the drink will be ready for pickup when you arrive.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You're the best!
